text: 26.64: Sng 110.1 naŋga, Dan 7.13 naŋga, Mt 24.30 naŋga, Lu 21.27 naŋga, Sɨ 7.55 naŋga, 1 Te 4.16 naŋga, Sk 1.7Kamavahi Jisas nuŋ nɨmavami, Nambi ambanaŋa. Hara yi narɨŋ ambin, muyɨvɨ Krundu Ñɨŋi mɨŋgaŋ ŋgɨtɨra, Got tɨkatɨka naŋga hamandu kuma kandɨ sambavu mɨnzɨrɨmandɨ. Kamata ihumbɨsa nɨmbu kɨta ihumukɨrɨ hɨmbañɨ payɨmandɨ, vami.
